features.name: Design Revamp with Micro-Interactions
features.description: Revamp the Personal Dashboard design with a fresh, modern aesthetic using the frontend-design plugin. Add polished micro-interactions using motion.dev (motion/react) - including hover effects, tap feedback, smooth transitions, layout animations, spring physics, and scroll-triggered animations.
verification: All 5 widgets have updated, cohesive design
Hover effects on all interactive elements
Tap/click feedback on buttons and cards
Smooth transitions when switching widget states
Layout animations for list items (tasks, notes, links)
Enter/exit animations for modals and new items
Responsive design maintained on all screen sizes

technicalNotes.designApproach: Use frontend-design plugin for distinctive, production-grade interface
